CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Handmade
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: flawed handmade rounds, with lower muzzle velocity, damage, and penetration than ammunition made with proper equipment.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Regular
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Base rocket with a high damage but low speed and armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: High Velocity
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: High velocity rockets with medium damage but higher speed and armor penetration

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Incendiary rockets with a larger explosion radius for a maximum impact area.
